DOC.brief_summary: This study is to assess the safety and effectiveness of the use of visco-assisted CyPass Micro-Stent implantation for the lowering of intraocular pressure (IOP) in patients who have open angle glaucoma (OAG).
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Visco-Assisted CyPass Micro-Stent Implantation in Patients With Open Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of open angle glaucoma; unmedicated IOP between 21 36 mmHg, inclusive; normal angle anatomy at site of intended CyPass MicroStent implantation Advanced glaucoma; prior incisional glaucoma surgery; acute angle closure, traumatic, congenital, malignant, uveitic or neovascular glaucoma; clinically significant ocular pathology other than glaucoma
